languages.text: "Молчать!" {n}Каллигос рявкает на стоящего подле старика. Взгляд его застилает кровь и ярость.{/n} "Я не скормил тебя лесным тварям лишь по одной причине — ты все еще можешь быть полезен. Если не желаешь помереть вместе с этими ксеносами... Заткни пасть".

traits.locale_text: "Молчать!" {n}Каллигос рявкает на стоящего подле старика. Взгляд его застилает кровь и ярость.{/n} "Я не скормил тебя лесным тварям лишь по одной причине — ты все еще можешь быть полезен. Если не желаешь помереть вместе с этими ксеносами... Заткни пасть".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."
languages.original_text: "Молчать!" {n}Каллигос рявкает на стоящего подле старика. Взгляд его застилает кровь и ярость.{/n} "Я не скормил тебя лесным тварям лишь по одной причине — ты все еще можешь быть полезен. Если не желаешь помереть вместе с этими ксеносами... Заткни пасть".

traits.locale_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man standing close by. His eyes are blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest bastards for a single reason — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... Shut your mouth."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man standing close by. His eyes are blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest bastards for a single reason — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... Shut your mouth."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man standing close by. His eyes are blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest bastards for a single reason — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... Shut your mouth."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «¡Silencio!», {n}vocifera Calligos al anciano. La sangre y la ira ciegan sus ojos.{/n} «Hay una única razón por la que no te he arrojado a esos bastardos del bosque y es porque aún puedes ser útil. Si no quieres morir con estos xenos... cierra la boca».
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."

traits.locale_text: «¡Silencio!», {n}vocifera Calligos al anciano que está junto a él. La sangre y la ira ciegan sus ojos.{/n} «La única razón por la que no te he arrojado a esos bastardos del bosque es porque aún puedes ser útil. Si no quieres morir con estos xenos... cierra la boca».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “闭嘴！”{n}卡里戈斯朝身边的老人咆哮道。他的眼睛被鲜血和怒火所蒙蔽。{/n}“我之所以没把你喂给那些森林杂种，只有一个原因：你说不定还有点用。如果你不想和这些异形一起死……就给我闭嘴。”
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴！”{n}卡里戈斯朝身边的老人咆哮道。他的眼睛被鲜血和怒火所蒙蔽。{/n}“我之所以没把你喂给那些森林杂种，只有一个原因：你说不定还有点用。如果你不想和这些异形一起死……就给我闭嘴。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Silence ! » {n}hurle Calligos au vieillard, ses yeux rouges de sang et de colère.{/n} « Si je ne t'ai pas jeté en pâture aux bêtes sauvages de la forêt, c'est parce que tu peux encore m'être utile. Si tu ne veux pas crever avec ces xénos... boucle-la. »
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."

traits.locale_text: « Silence ! » {n}hurle Calligos à l'homme qui se trouve à côté de lui. Ses yeux sont rouges de sang et de colère.{/n} « Si je ne t'ai pas jeté en pâture à ces salopards de la forêt, c'est parce que tu peux encore m'être utile. Si tu ne veux pas crever avec ces xénos... boucle-la. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「黙れ！」{n} カリゴスは老人に吠える。彼の目は血と怒りで曇っている。{/n}「俺がお前を森の畜生どもに食わせなかった理由はただ一つ。お前がまだ使えるかもしれないからだ。異種族と一緒に死にたくなければ…口を閉じていろ」
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ！」{n} カリゴスは老人に吠える。彼の目は血と怒りで曇っている。{/n}「俺がお前を森の畜生どもに食わせなかった理由はただ一つ。お前がまだ使えるかもしれないからだ。異種族と一緒に死にたくなければ…口を閉じていろ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Schweigt!" {n}Calligos bellt den alten Mann an. Seine Augen sind geblendet von Blut und Zorn.{/n} "Ich habe Euch nur aus einem einzigen Grund nicht an die Biester im Wald verfüttert — weil Ihr mir noch nützlich sein könntet. Wenn Ihr nicht mit diesen Xenos sterben wollt ... haltet die Fresse."
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."

traits.locale_text: "Schweigt!" {n}Calligos bellt den alten Mann an, der neben ihm steht. Seine Augen sind geblendet von Blut und Zorn.{/n} "Ich habe Euch nur aus einem einzigen Grund nicht an die Waldbastarde verfüttert — weil Ihr mir noch nützlich sein könntet. Wenn Ihr nicht mit diesen Xenos sterben wollt ... Dann haltet Eure Fresse."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Kes sesini!" {n}Calligos, ihtiyar adama bağırıyor. Gözleri, kan ve öfkeyle köre dönmüş.{/n} "Seni ormandaki yaratıklara sadece tek bir nedenden dolayı yedirmedim. O da hâlâ işime yarayabilme ihtimalin. Bu zenolarla birlikte ölmek istemiyorsan... Kapa çeneni."
languages.original_text: "Silence!" {n}Calligos barks at the old man, his eyes blinded by blood and rage.{/n} "I did not feed you to the forest beasts for one reason and one reason only — you may still be of use. If you do not want to die with these xenos... shut your mouth."
